Item.name: Oxygen Tank
Item.description: An Oxygen Tank can be used as fuel for certain tools or as breathable gas for diving masks and suits.

Item.name: Oxygenite Tank
Item.description: A Tank containing liquid Oxygenite. Oxygenite lasts a lot longer and is much more effective than a breathable gas.

Item.name: Oxygen Bottle
Item.description: This version of the Oxygen Tank is smaller and lighter than the standard but only holds half as much.

Item.name: Diving Mask
Item.description: Small enough to carry around in case of need, but won't protect you from the water pressure in the event of a full-blown hull breach.

Item.name: Ballistic Diving Mask
Item.description: Type-1 certified gas mask fitted with a proper breathing apparatus and hood. Face area is protected by kevlar backed by polymer plates. Once standard issue, now one of Europa's valuables. Features a built-in system to identify any non-oxygen tanks and refuses to use them to protect the wearer.

Item.name: Rebreather
Item.description: A breathing mask that recycles the user's exhaled breath, reducing the amount of oxygen needed from the equipped tank.

Item.name: Beaked Rebreather
Item.description: A breathing mask that recycles the user's exhaled breath, reducing the amount of oxygen needed from the equipped tank. Someone must've been a fan of birds.

Item.name: Wetsuit
Item.description: A wetsuit allows faster movement underwater but it can't withstand the immense pressure under Europa's crust unless properly sealed.

Item.name: Fancy Wetsuit
Item.description: A wetsuit allows faster movement underwater but it can't withstand the immense pressure under Europa's crust unless properly sealed. This one is fancy but impractical.

Item.name: Ballistic Wetsuit
Item.description: A wetsuit allows faster movement underwater but it can't withstand the immense pressure under Europa's crust unless properly sealed.

Item.name: Exosuit
Item.description: An atmospheric suit capable of withstanding the immense pressure under Europa's crust.

Item.name: Assault Exosuit
Item.description: An atmospheric military suit designed to be used in boarding missions against enemy vessels. It has increased armor but it's really cumbersome, unless powered.

Item.name: Derelict Exosuit
Item.description: An old exosuit used by the coalition years ago. It's heavily damaged and rusted.

Item.name: Reinforced Diving Helmet
Item.description: A lead and titanium reinforced helmet fitted with the ability to take oxygen tanks. Fitted with a built-in communications system. Designed to be used with the Reinforced Divesuit

Item.name: Reinforced Divesuit
Item.description: A utility diving suit with metal reinforcements within the high strength-fabric and plastics. Protects against the crushing depths, but only when sealed with the appropriate helmet. Requires a battery to power the built-in auto-injectors filled with Fibrinozine.

Item.name: Underwater Scooter
Item.description: An energy-powered underwater propulsion device.

Item.name: Underwater Scooter II
Item.description: This underwater scooter has been upgraded with better energy usage efficiency.

Item.name: Underwater Scooter III
Item.description: This underwater scooter has been upgraded with a better energy usage efficiency and propulsion system.

Item.name: Diving Kit
Item.description: A battery-powered underwater propulsion device combined with a small chest. Will draw power from any stored portable power source.

Item.name: Glowstick
Item.description: A self-contained, short-term light-source consisting of a translucent plastic tube containing isolated substances that, when combined, make light through chemiluminescence, so it does not require an external energy source.

Item.name: Breaching Kit
Item.description: A small polycarbonate toolkit designed to hold to hold extra oxygen and equipment for assaulting and breaching other submarines.

Item.name: Diving Bag
Item.description: A heavy backpack designed to be used with a wetsuit to assist in the recovery of items in water.
